name: Super Mario Coin Grabber V1.0 Online
name_original: Super Mario Coin Grabber V1.0 Online
description:
Welcome to Super Mario Coin Grabber V1.0!

Click S to begin

Sometimes the Scratch logo won't hide, so click S until it does so

Use the arrow keys!  

Don't worry, Mario won't fall because I have not made that a feature. Except for one or two parts of the level...  I know that is easy but a later version should have that plus, there IS one or to die parts.

Collect as many coins as possible!

Comment below for bugs.
